text:
Criteria | iOS Developer (Swift) | Los Angeles,CA | Full Time, ONSITE We're looking for a talented iOS Developer who will be responsible for developing the next generation of our iOS app, JobFlare. JobFlare is a brain games app for job seekers. You'll become a key part of a small team and work closely with the Product Manager, Lead Designer, and senior executives shaping the vision for the app. Because JobFlare is a very young app, you should be comfortable iterating quickly to incorporate user feedback and improve upon the feature set.

Click here to read the full job description or apply: https://www.criteriacorp.com/company/ios_developer.php
